page.title: 06Fifield Chapel.
page.content: The Chapel is a wooden building which was originally built at Grove Farm but in 1897 it was moved on rollers to a new site in Fifield Road. It is used regularly and on Sunday mornings a {Sunday School}is held between 10.10 and 11.00 and about fifteen children usually attend.We play a game and then we split up into groups. In the first and second groups we get puzzle sheets to do about the Bible stories. At all the special times of the year we have a family service.When it is our Harvest Festival all the old people of the village come.At Christmas we perform a play which our parents watch and afterwards we have a party that is followed by quizzes and a few games. In the summer we go on a day trip.We have a{Monday club}when we play many different games.Adults also attend services in the chapel.
